greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^(5*k-1)).
comment: Convolution of this sequence and A280454 is A203776.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) ~ exp(sqrt(n/15)*Pi) / (2^(9/5)*15^(1/4)*n^(3/4)) * (1 + (Pi/(240*sqrt(15)) - 3*sqrt(15)/(8*Pi)) / sqrt(n)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 18 2017, extended Jan 24 2017
G.f.: Sum_{k>=0} x^(k*(5*k + 3)/2) / Product_{j=1..k} (1 - x^(5*j)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 24 2020
mathematica: nmax = 200; CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + x^(5*k - 1)), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
nmax = 200; poly = ConstantArray[0, nmax + 1]; poly[[1]] = 1; poly[[2]] = 0; Do[If[Mod[k, 5] == 4, Do[poly[[j + 1]] += poly[[j - k + 1]], {j, nmax, k, -1}]; ], {k, 2, nmax}]; poly
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 18 2017
